data.title: Original Auntie Mame (1958) movie poster in VG condition for $$1200
data.meta_description: Original  movie poster for AUNTIE MAME (1958) 10373 Movie Poster  Large Format Six-Sheet Original  Rosalind Russell  Forrest Tucker  Coral Browne  Roger Smith  Peggy Cass  Morton Da Costa Warner Brothers Six Sheet Poster.  81x81  Very Good Condition. Offered by Kirby McDaniel MovieArt of Austin, Texas.
data.text:
Warner Brothers Six Sheet Poster. 81x81 Very Good Condition.

Original Warner Brothers Six Sheet poster for the Morton DaCosta comedy, AUNTIE MAME (1958) starring Rosalind Russell, Forrest Tucker, Coral Browne, Roger Smith, and Peggy Cass. Mame (Russell) is an unconventional socialite in the roaring 1920s who must raise her nephew Patrick (Smith) after his father dies. Together Mame and Patrick have some zany adventures in this highly theatrical movie version of the celebrated Broadway success. The film garnered 6 Academy Award nominations-- including Best Picture, and Best Actress for Russell, and Best Supporting Actress for Cass. This original six sheet poster was a theater-used poster from the original release of the film. We we got the poster, we photographed it as you see it. The condition of the six sheet is folded, obviously, but with excellent paper integrity and good color. We have put this poster in the queue for linen backing. The six sheet poster is a large poster, printed on four separate panels which are then joined to make one 81x81 inch poster. Condition is very good unrestored to fine plus on linen. Scarce in this format.

Forrest Tucker - Actor

MORTON DaCOSTA - Director

Rosalind Russell - Actor

Peggy Cass - Actor

Fred Clark - Actor

Coral Browne - Actor

Roger Smith - Actor
